topic.title: Director Decision
topic.section:
Under the Director Decision section, the Author can view the decision from the Track Director, the Director/Author Email Record entered by the Track Director, and a Director Version, if one has been uploaded. The Author can also click on the email icon to generate an email to the Track Director.

The Author can upload a revised version of submission next to Upload Author Version. Once uploaded, it appears as Author Version under Director Decision and Peer Review on this page. The Author Version also appears under Director Decision on the Track Director's Review Page.

If the submission process is of the Abstract followed by Presentation variant, once the abstract is accepted the Author will need to upload the full paper: the Author logs in, clicks on the submission title, and completes the final steps of the submission process.
